All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.ejb.EnterpriseBean, javax.ejb.SessionBean
public class CrossReferencingTransformerPluginBean
extends com.amalto.core.objects.transformers.v2.ejb.TransformerPluginV2CtrlBean
implements javax.ejb.SessionBean

Cross Referencing Plugin

Plugin name: crossreferencing

Description

The cross-referencing plugins takes an input XML and will cross-reference (e.g. replace the content of) a designated list of elements using the content extracted from Items stored in the database.

The plugin offers the possibility to
  • perform multipl cross-references on the source XML document in one pass
  • either ignore a failed cross-reference or throw an error and stop execution of the transformer
  • specify a default value when the cross-referencing fails and errors are ignored

Note: this plugins provides enhanced functionality over the built-in cross-referencing provided by the XSLT plugin

Inputs

  • xml: the source xml on which the cro

Outputs


Parameters

Parameters to the plugin

Author:
Bruno Grieder, David Le Niniven
